title: Stateful Trait Parameters
description: Configuration contract for the Stateful trait's status machine.

states.description: Ordered list of lifecycle states available to consumers.

initialState.description: State assigned when an entity is created.

transitionRules.description: Allowed state transition map. Keys are source states; values are arrays of permitted target states. Null means open model (all transitions allowed).

requireTransitionReason.description: When true, every state transition must include a human-readable reason.
